item.title: Server Side Tagging In Google Tag Manager
item.description: Ever since Server-side tagging was publicly announced at SUPERWEEK 2019, Google and the trusted tester community have been hard at work, building something that just might change the landscape of digital analytics for good. Google Tag Manager has now released Server-side tagging into public beta. In this lengthy article, we'll take a look at what Server-side tagging is, how it should (and should not) be used, and what its implications are on the broader digital analytics community.
